content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(1, 1)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 1.0, 1.0) and a furnace at position(1.0, 1.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Assembling machine at position(2.0, 2.0) and inserter at position(2.5, 2.5) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 2.5) that connects the furnace at position(1.0, 1.0) to assembling machine at position(2.0, 2.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the furnace. Check your inventory to confirm the presence of copper ore before executing the insert command.

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient materials
- Always verify the materials required for crafting before attempting to craft. Ensure you have enough copper plates and copper cables in your inventory to meet the crafting requirements.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
